    • \

    • \PHPUnitTestRunner

    Simple Testrunner for PHPUnit that runs all tests of a testsuite.

    author Michiel Rook
    version $Id: 5926dfc1177ec0c52ec275a8e542979c8deb6e6f $
    package phing.tasks.ext.phpunit
    since 2.1.0
